current.backorder_text:
Like many other global businesses, we have been impacted by COVID-19. Our team is working hard to continue operations while doing everything we can to slow the spread of the virus - and support our weavers and their families.

All domestic orders are being shipped from our U.S. warehouse in St. Louis, MO. If you have further questions, please take a look at our FAQ page. If you have any further questions or concerns, contact us.

We’re here for you!

JOE & RACHEL

settings.text_desktop: Welcome back Shark Tank fans! We're so excited to share our wild journey with you. Stay tuned for more big news! -Rach & Joe
settings.text_mobile: Welcome back Shark Tank fans! We're so excited to share our wild journey with you.

settings.subscribe_paragraph: Join our VIP List to get Insider  relaxation tips, special offers & blissful beams of sunshine from our team
settings.subscribe_success: You're in! We'll reach out soon...

settings.title: Durability
settings.text: Woven with ultra-soft performance yarn, our Signature hammocks are weathersafe, fade-proof, and super strong with a high weight capacity.

settings.title: Versatility
settings.text: Ball ‘em up, bag ‘em, and take ‘em with you. Our hammocks are easily transportable and super simple to hang.

settings.title: Relaxibility
settings.text: While relaxability isn’t a real word, you might start using it after kicking back in one of our ultra-soft hammocks – crafted for ultimate comfort and relaxation.

settings.title: The Performance
settings.subtitle: Our hammocks are comfortable, portable, and built to last.

settings.title: Woven by hand
settings.text: Meticulously woven by our expert craftswomen in Thailand, each hammock is its own work of art that can take up to 6-10 days to complete.

settings.title: One of a kind
settings.text: No two Yellow Leaf Hammocks are the same; Hand-made, -dyed, and signed by its weaver, each hammock has its own unique pattern and color sequence.

settings.title: Engineered for comfort
settings.text: This level of quality can’t be replicated by a machine. Our “triple-weave” construction uses around 150,000 ultra-soft loops to cradle you weightlessly.

settings.title: The Craft
settings.subtitle: Each hammock is woven by hand, making it uniquely yours.

settings.title: 100% woven by hand
settings.text: Impeccably woven by our expert craftswomen in Thailand, each hammock is a functional work of art

settings.title: One of a kind
settings.text: Each hammock is uniquely hand-crafted and signed by its artisan weaver (a truly limited edition!)

settings.title: Engineered for comfort
settings.text: This quality can’t be replicated by a machine. Our unique Weightless Weave™ construction uses 150,000 (!) interwoven loops to perfectly distribute your weight ... so all your tension instantly evaporates!

settings.title: The Craft
settings.subtitle: Each hammock is woven by hand, making it uniquely yours.

settings.title: The Performance
settings.text: Woven with weathersafe materials of the highest quality, our hammocks are versatile, durable, and deeply comfortable.

settings.title: The Comfort
settings.text: Lightweight, feathersoft, and super strong, our hammocks guarantee ultimate comfort and an audible exhale.

settings.title: The Craft
settings.text: Our hammocks are woven by hand with over 150,000 ultra-soft loops, crafted for deep comfort and relaxation.

settings.title: The Impact
settings.text: Yellow Leaf empowers our craftswomen and their families to break the cycle of poverty and build a brighter future.

settings.title: Why hang with us?
settings.subtitle: We make hammocks you can truly relax in.

settings.title: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer:
In-stock hammocks will ship same day for orders placed before 3 pm PT.

Our hammocks ship free in the U.S. and generally arrive within 2-5 days of ordering.

If you want to expedite shipping, that’s possible at checkout!

settings.title: How do I hang my hammock?
settings.answer:
The possibilities are endless! Our hammocks are very versatile and work in a wide range of hanging scenarios. Our suggested dimensions (listed on each product page) are meant to help you achieve maximum comfort .

We also offer more detailed guidance in the “Hammocking 101” Guidebook that comes with your hammock.

And our beloved Hammock Concierge is always here to help you out!

settings.title: What’s your return policy?
settings.answer:
If you aren’t happy, neither are we. 30-Day Returns are simple and free - we’ll provide you with a label to print and ship back.

If you have questions or problems with your hammock, we’re always happy to help.

settings.title: I have even more questions!
settings.answer:
We’ve got you covered. We’re hammocking experts and we love to share our wisdom.

Check out our detailed FAQ for fast answers.

The Hammock Concierge is on call for those really tough relaxation challenges. Email us at concierge@yellowleafhammocks.com.

settings.title:
You’ve got questions, 
we’ve got answers.
The Hammock Throne
settings.subtitle: Elevate your relaxation.
settings.text: Thoughtfully designed with our most discerning hangers in mind, our new Hammock Throne is a beautifully crafted, minimalist relaxation piece — bringing the ultimate in relaxation and style to your backyard, living room, or office.

settings.title: Your Impact
settings.subtitle: Your hammock naps are truly life-changing.
settings.text: Through training and sustainable job creation, Yellow Leaf customers directly empower our weavers and their families to break the cycle of poverty and build a brighter future.

settings.review_excerpt: "Best addition to our yard in a decade!"
"Heavenly! I could sleep in this thing!"
"I love that each hammock has a tag with who it was made by!"
"Tks for remaining a quality product in this time of poor quality items!"

settings.title: Kind Words
settings.subtitle: You guys love hanging with us.

settings.title: The journey to relaxation.
settings.description: Finding a hammock you can truly relax in didn’t happen overnight. It started with a chance discovery while on vacation, and took a lot of hard work (and a lot of hanging around) to bring the softest, most comfortable, and thoughtfully crafted hammocks to your backyard.

settings.title: Transforming communities.
settings.description: Each individual Yellow Leaf hammock is handwoven with the utmost precision and care by the expert craftswomen of the Mlabri Tribe – “the people of the yellow leaves” – in the hills of Northern Thailand. Across three weaving communities, we are working to create jobs for mothers and build a foundation for positive community transformation.

settings.text: We cut out the middleman and get money directly into the hands of our weavers.

settings.title: Empowering women.
settings.description: Creating jobs for women is especially important for community transformation. Research shows that women will spend up to 90% of their income on health, nutrition, and education for their families.

settings.text: Turning women into breadwinners not only builds self-esteem, but improves their standing in the community and enables them to pool resources and improve infrastructure.

settings.title: How we got here.
settings.description: In 2011, while on vacation in Thailand, our co-founder Joe embarked on an impromptu motorcycle adventure that led him to discover the world’s most comfortable hammock hanging outside a hut on a tiny island.

settings.text: The hammocks were unlike anything Joe had ever seen or felt before, and he knew he had to share them with the world.

settings.title: Bringing it home.
settings.description: He bought as many as he could fit in his backpack and headed home, ready to turn his vacation dream into a reality. Joe teamed up with his now-wife Rachel to establish Yellow Leaf—bringing a curated collection of beautifully crafted, ultra-comfortable hammocks to the masses, while giving back to the original crafters of the world’s most comfortable hammocks.

settings.title: Do good. Relax.
settings.subtitle:
Doing good while relaxing? 
We can hang with that.

settings.title: You can hang out anywhere
settings.text:
Our versatile hammocks can be hung indoors, outdoors, between two trees, on a balcony, in the backyard or anywhere you need an escape.

With your Hammocking 101 Guide (included) you’ll be kicking back in no time. And our Hammock Concierge is always on standby to offer personalized solutions.

settings.caption: Sink into a Yellow Leaf Hammock and you’ll be saying “ahhh” in no time.
settings.title: “It’s like being back in the womb.”
settings.text:
(At least that’s what our customers tell us).
While we can’t guarantee a womb-like environment, we can promise ultimate comfort, cloudlike softness against your skin, and an audible exhale.

settings.title: You can hang out anywhere
settings.text:
Our versatile hammocks can be hung indoors, outdoors, between two trees, on a balcony, in the backyard or anywhere you need an escape.

With your Hammocking 101 Guide (included) you’ll be kicking back in no time. And our Hammock Concierge is always on standby to offer personalized solutions.

settings.subscribe_paragraph: Something special is coming. Drop us your deets below to stay updated on all things relaxing.

settings.title: Are these the best hammocks ever?
Orders + Shipping
settings.answer:
Can I track my order?
Yes, when your order ships you will receive a shipping notification e-mail with your hammock’s tracking information (note: this is a separate e-mail from your order confirmation). 

How much does shipping cost?
We offer FREE Shipping on every hammock to any destination within the U.S.

You can also expedite your hammock order via UPS 2-Day Air ($45) to receive your hammock within 2 business days or Next-Day UPS Air ($75) for delivery on the next business day.

International Shipping for hammocks costs a flat $40.

We are not able to expedite shipping for hammock stands. Please note that we can only ship hammock stands within the U.S. at this time.

How long does shipping take?
Free U.S. Shipping will take between 2-5 days, unless otherwise specified in the product details. 

If your preferred hammock is in stock, there are also two options to expedite your order: Select UPS 2-Day Air ($45) to receive your hammock within 2 business days. Select UPS Next-Day Air ($75) for delivery on the next business day. Please note that expedited shipping is not available for hammock stands.

Do you ship internationally?
Yes! For a flat $40 shipping charge, we can ship a hammock to you anywhere in the world. All international orders are shipped directly from our weaving warehouse in Thailand via DHL and typically take 5-10 days to arrive. (Please note that international customers are responsible for any duties/customs fees. Any returned packages due to customs payment refusal will be subject to an additional fee for shipping costs.) For international returns/exchanges, the shipping costs must be covered by the customer. Please note that we are only able to ship hammock stands domestically.

settings.title: Hanging a Hammock
settings.answer:
How do I hang my hammock?
Each hammock comes with a “Hammocking 101” Guide to help you get it set up. If you’ve misplaced yours and have any questions, not to worry! You can check out our hammock hanging guide or product info chart for size specs!

Do hammocks come with hanging hardware, accessories or stands?
Each Yellow Leaf Hammock includes a "Hammocking 101" Guide with instructions on where and how to hang your hammock. Because there are a range of options for hanging, we do not automatically include hardware with your hammock. We sell versatile tree straps and an adjustable hammock stand on our website, but these aren't the only options for installation!

Do you sell spreader bars for your Hanging Chair Hammocks?
At this time we do not carry spreader bars - we are in the process of finding a manufacturer that is aligned with our social / environmental impact mission! Luckily, you don't need a spreader bar to hang the Hanging Chair Hammock. Most customers choose to hang the hammock from two points above (like a beam or tree branch) using straps or rope, or between two trees! Check out our instagram account for ideas.

Are your hammocks compatible with other stands?
Yes, our hammocks are compatible with many stands on the market. It's best to compare our product dimensions with the stand manufacturer's specifications. (If your stand is more than 12 ft. long, it may be possible to use rope or chain to extend your hammock's length.)

settings.title: Product Information
settings.answer:
Do your hammocks stand up well to the elements?
You bet! Our signature Performance Yarn is weather-proof and UV-resistant, so it won’t fade with time or exposure to the elements - surprisingly rare among hammocks.

What are the hammocks made out of?
Our Signature Hammocks are 100% handwoven with a specially-made, soft-spun colorfast acrylic Performance Yarn. The cotton rope line is - you guessed it - 100% cotton!

How can I keep my hammock in prime condition?
Every hammock comes with care recommendations, but they are super sturdy and easy to care for! Our Signature + Hanging Chair Hammocks are made from a weathersafe Performance Yarn that can be left out in the sun + rain with no worries about fading, mildew, etc. (We call these ones "lazy-proof" because you can leave them out all season!) The most important hammock-care precaution is to avoid snagging the yarn with any sharp objects, hooks, jewelry, buttons, etc.

Yikes! How can I repair a tear or snag?
Oh no! We feel your heartbreak. Your best bet is to snap a few photos that show what the damage looks like and email your pics + some info about the incident to concierge@yellowleafhammocks.com. That way our Hammock Concierge can help get you relaxing asap! In the meantime, we suggest not using your hammock as a safety precaution and to avoid further damage.

settings.title: Returns + Exchanges
settings.answer:
What is your return policy?
If you aren’t happy, neither are we. We want you to try our hammocks out absolutely risk-free!

Our 30-day stress-free returns and exchange policy dates from the day you receive your order. For domestic (U.S.) hammock returns, we will provide a free return shipping label and you can simply box it up and send it back.

Please note that for international orders and for hammock stand orders, the shipping costs for returns/exchanges must be covered by the customer.

Each returned item will be inspected. If upon inspection the items are deemed to have been damaged or altered in any way, your refund or exchange credit will be subject to approval.

Please note that custom hammock orders are final.

How do I return or exchange my hammock?
No problem! Visit our Returns Page to get started.

settings.title: Wholesale + Partnerships
settings.answer: We can only spread our mission to the world with the help of our AMAZING retail + resort partners. If you’re interested in a partnership, please fill out the form on our partnership page or reach out to wholesale@yellowleafhammocks.com

settings.title: Joining the Team
settings.answer:
How can I join the Yellow Leaf Hammocks team?
We're Hiring! Check out our open positions. Thanks for your interest in joining the team!

settings.sub_heading: Bring the ultimate comfort & style to your backyard, living room, or office.
settings.list_headings: Ridiculously comfy||Weathersafe||​All handmade with unique pattern and color sequences
settings.but_1: Yes! I Want To Elevate My Relaxation!

settings.heading_content: A minimalist footprint means The Hammock Throne always fits in.
settings.content_pera: You can tuck your Hammock Throne into a quiet corner, make it the centerpiece of your living room or bring it outdoors for the summer!

settings.heading_content: 360° Panoramic Swivel so you can experience every great view.
settings.content_pera: The Swivel creates flexibility so you can gaze out the window or snuggle up to watch your favorite show. (And the glide is so smooth it feels like magic.)

settings.heading_content: Effortlessly transforms from a chair to a full-length hammock.
settings.content_pera: You can tuck your Hammock Throne into a quiet corner, make it the centerpiece of your living room or bring it outdoors for the summer!

settings.heading_content: Designed for indoor style, but ready to conquer the elements.
settings.content_pera: The Hammock Throne is designed to look great in your home, but made durable to live outdoors. Think: summer by the pool and winter by the fireplace.

settings.heading_content: “The Anchor” base is stable, strong and sleek.
settings.content_pera: The base of The Hammock Throne is a perfectly symmetrical circle of steel. It has a chic streamlined look, but it’s incredibly strong and sturdy.

settings.heading_content: Sustainably harvested beechwood chosen for its strength and beauty.
settings.content_pera: From the beginning, we envisioned The Hammock Throne as an heirloom piece of furniture. The graceful curves of the hardwood are perfectly milled and seamlessly interlocked.

settings.pera_heading: Gain the freedom to kick back and relax like never before with our unique Hammock Thones!
settings.sub_subheading: Take your pick of wood and metal finishes so that it will fit the look, feel, and style of your home!
settings.pera_tagline: After your purchase, our Hammock Concierge will personally reach out and help you select the finishes for your throne. You will be able to customize between a light wood or dark wood frame, as well as a white or grey base
settings.area_tex2: You’ll also select your chair hammock color from one of our handmade designs, or choose to custom design your own. We’ll be there to help you out every step of the way (consider us your relaxation butler).
settings.buttont_area_text: Yellow Leaf Hammocks are loved by 10,000+ customers
settings.test_desc: Best. Decision. Ever. It is the greatest piece of furniture I own now. I relax, suspended in perfect comfort in my Yellow Leaf Hammock. It has changed me deeply.

Ridiculously Comfy
settings.content_area_peragraph: Treat yourself, because you know what they say... It’s not about being good at something, it’s about being good to yourself. Our hammocks are designed to cradle you weightlessly, giving you every opportunity to let your mind run free. Oh go on… you deserve to put your feet up.

settings.sec_top_area: Don't Just Take Our Word For It...
settings.tagline_pera: We asked a number of strangers to test out our Hammock Throne for themselves... Check out what they said below!

settings.tagline_heading: Now why not hear from some of our loyal customers and see what they have to say about our ridiculously soft hammocks!
settings.testimonal_desc2: I bought the hammock first without the stand. Mistake to which I corrected. It is very nice. Unfortunately, I do not have two trees to hang it from, but the stand is very doable and appears durable. Overall, a very nice product, and great customer service.
settings.testimonal_desc3: I love my hammock chair - insanely comfortable and easy to hang, comes with clear instructions on how to hang. I have had a very good experience with Yellow Leaf Hammocks and have found them very professional. I love that the name of the woman who made my hammock is written on my hammock. :)
settings.testimonial_desc4: The perfect blend of comfort, flexibility and mobility. We love the color, stays bold through all weather. We pack it back in its tote bag and take it on the road, no better way to relax in these warm summer months!
